subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Questions about whether No. 3 Texas deserves to play in the B.C.S. championship game may be as loud as they have been all season after the Longhorns escaped Kyle Field with a wild win.
snippet: Questions about whether No. 3 Texas deserves to play in the B.C.S. championship game may be as loud as they have been all season after the Longhorns escaped Kyle Field with a wild win.
